ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mean mean nasty Maestro
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Really?  They reset it for you?  One of my guild leaders, who has spent a great deal of time studying Kedge, figured out that there are specific MOBs who,
ygData.messageBody:
jay schultze wrote:
>
> Ugh 12 bugged horses at Phini...That happened to us a couple times. Phini
> supposed to have 4 swirlspine seahorse guards up top and 4 swirlspine
> guardians inside his lair. After we killed the regular swirls, we went to
> pull and ended up with at least a dozen guardians + phini. We figured it out
> though - well, what was causing the problem on our server anyways: Previous
> failed attempts, causing the horses to get stuck, and something triggering a
> spawn of additional horses. We called a GM and he reset the zone for us.
>
> Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
> 50th Bard of Veeshan

Really? They reset it for you? One of my guild leaders, who has spent a
great deal of time studying Kedge, figured out that there are specific MOBs
who, if killed, cause an additional guardian to spawn. Seeing a dozen isn't
at all unusual if you wait too long after a server reset. If they'll reset
that, it's an interesting thing to know. Right now, we just don't bother with
Phinny if it's been more than a few days since the last reset.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 47.6 songs, Innoruuk
